reviews.text: This hotel is well located, close to both a Metro station (Schwedenplatz) and the historic central city, which are both just over the bridge. It was everything that a hotel should be, the staff were very friendly and the breakfast buffet was comprehensive.
reviews.title: Good location, good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel based on a few factors. First, we had stayed at Mercures before while travelling in Europe, they are a chain hotel in Europe part of Accor hotels, also belonging are Ibis which are more basic. Also, the reviews sounded good. This hotel is close to most things however you have to take public transit to get there. When we arrived, the main train station was under construction therefore we arrived into the Bahnhof Miedling and it was 3 subways to get to this hotel. Their subway system in Vienna is very easy to understand and it’s very efficient so even though we had to change trains a few times it still took only about 20-30 minutes max from when we got off our train and then into the hotel. The stop on the subway that is the closest is Schweder Platz. From there it is a 10 minute walk to the hotel along a sidewalk and the river. I can understand people not wanting to stay here because of the necessity to take public transit but honestly it was very easy to do and it did not take away anything from our stay.
reviews.title: nice hotel, need to take u-bahn to downtown.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The main sights in Vienna are easily accessible by subway and you can see the steeple of the main church from the street where the hotel is. Stephens Platz is one stop away on the subway and the Schonbrunn Palace is a bit of a longer trip on the subway but still easy to do.
reviews.title: A winter weekend break

reviews.text: The rooms were big, especially by European standards, and the bathroom had a bathtub and shower ensemble. The television had English news channels, CNN, BBC and MSnbC to keep you connected. There is free wifi all over the hotel, as well as a computer in the lobby but it was spotty and the connection went in and out. It was enough to check the email here and there but I wouldn’t count on it to be super reliable.
reviews.title: Decent Hotel in the City

reviews.text: There is a bakery on the corner of the street and once you walk a couple of blocks there are many food options. Most of which are traditional Viennese fare. If you go at Christmastime, anytime after November 25, there are an abundance of Christmas markets, none like you’ve ever seen before in North America. The biggest one is at the Rathaus and it is also easily accessible by Public Transit.
reviews.title: Stay at Hotel Mercure Wien City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After comparing the high prices charged for hotels in this beautiful city, I have no regrets about choosing the Mercure. The hotel website price was reasonable and the breakfasts were full and well-serviced. I found the rooms quite large and certainly comfortable with good internet connection as well as access to a free computer downstairs. When we were unable to get to breakfast one morning due to an early rise to catch the train to Budapest, the hotel gladly provided us with a packed lunch. A free welcome drink was provided on arrival and the reception was always helpful and available. I particularly liked ther hotel's location, only a five minute walk to the underground station and a ten to fifteen minute walk to the cathedral. We spent four nights here and found nothing to complain about! I would also warmly recommend the restaurant Mini; it was the best meal of the trip!
reviews.title: A perfectly good choice for a city break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: bad location 15 min walk to city center on the opposite side of the river. small bedroom and old bathroom. the view from our room is ok. the breakfast was not bad. free Wi-Fi. and free tea/coffee in bedrooms.
reviews.title: bad location

reviews.text: Typical Accor-hotel... you know what you will get when you book it.
reviews.title: Typical Accor-hotel... decent and good

reviews.text: Good service, good room, good bathroom, everything functional, warm and running... decent and good.
reviews.title: Good location, average hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Quiet location at walking distance from the city centre.
reviews.title: Business Area Hotel

reviews.text: Once again a great stay at this place, and, I appreciate, still some "smoking"-Rooms. The rooms as usual clean and comfortable, the staff friendly and helpful and a easy check-in and check-out. If you are searching for a centrally located good hotel, this is the place to be.
reviews.title: Really great place to stay

reviews.text: The location of the hotel is perfect and the staff was very helpful and friendly. The room was well-equipped, free wifi, there was no noise from the street (courtyarded room). Fast check-in/out, inhouse parking.
reviews.title: Perfect location, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a very good hotel with reasonable price. The room is not very big but cosy. The furnitures, bathroom facilities inside the room look very new and clean. There is a cute rubber duck by the bathtub. The reception staff is friendly and very patiently gives tourism advices. The location of the hotel is good, the big shopping street is within walking distance and there are plenty of restaurant around for a nice brunch.
reviews.title: Nice room, friendly staff and good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here in October the hotel was modern and clean. It was reasonably central but there was still a bit of a walk to some of the main sights. Price wise, I would have liked a little bit more for my money, however in fairness I believe Vienna (Wien) is quite an expensive place anyway so maybe I was expecting too much.
reviews.title: Good clean hotel, avarage value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent hotel. Very modern. Breakfast spread is very good.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms (especially the one we stayed on the 7th floor) are modern and so are the washrooms.
reviews.title: Not a bad choice....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is located within walking distance of Schwedenplatz metro station and an even nearer tram station. The Danube canal is within walking distance as well.
reviews.title: Good location, friendly staff, bad bedding
